botan.pubkey.algo.dh

Diffie-Hellman

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

struct DHPublicKey;
This class represents Diffie-Hellman public keys.

this(DLGroup grp, BigInt y1);
Construct a public key with the specified parameters.

Params:
DLGroup grp the DL group to use in the key
BigInt y1 the public value y

struct DHPrivateKey;
This class represents Diffie-Hellman private keys.

this()(in AlgorithmIdentifier alg_id, auto ref const SecureVector!ubyte key_bits, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Load a DH private key

Params:
AlgorithmIdentifier alg_id the algorithm id
SecureVector!ubyte key_bits the subject public key
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator

this(RandomNumberGenerator rng, DLGroup grp, BigInt x_arg = 0);
Construct a private key with predetermined value.

Params:
RandomNumberGenerator rng random number generator to use
DLGroup grp the group to be used in the key
BigInt x_arg the key's secret value (or if zero, generate a new key)

class DHKAOperation: botan.pubkey.pk_ops.KeyAgreement;
DH operation
